Let Me Tell You a Few Things...

BIO

As fortune would have it, you've found yourself on the portfolio website of Effemie Boone (but you can just call her Effie). Effie is a full-stack web developer who specializes in creating full stack apps with Node.js.
Effie does it all: the front-end design and functionality, the backend REST APIs and database functionality. Whatever the job may be, Effie knows her way around HTML5, CSS3, and front and back end Javascript.
Effie hopes to one day work full time as a web developer at a company where she can grow as a technology professional.
